Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface Game
    The game interface - this will control the Battleship game. It will keep track of 2 versions of the "board" - one for each player. It will let players take turns. It will announce hits, misses, and ships sunk (by calling the appropriate methods in the Player interface/class).
    Author:
    swapneel

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Player p1,
                Player p2)
        This method will initialize the game. At the end of this method, the board has been set up and the game can be started
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player 1
        p2 - Player 2

      • playGame

        Player playGame()
        This is the start point of playing the game. The game will alternate between the players letting them take shots at the other team.
        Returns:
        Player who won
